content.raw:
We moved the gazebo math functionality to a 3rd-party package called ignition-math:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src

It has a [ignition/math/Vector3.hh](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/c86dbbcbee2e892af289ef0cf2dc8c0c0b463e73/include/ignition/math/Vector3.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) with mostly the same API. An example migrating from gazebo to ignition math is in pull request #2586.

* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2586/use-ignition-math-in-physics-road-and/diff#chg-gazebo/physics/Population.cc
content.html:
We moved the gazebo math functionality to a 3rd-party package called ignition-math:

  • https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src

It has a ignition/math/Vector3.hh with mostly the same API. An example migrating from gazebo to ignition math is in pull request #2586.

  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2586/use-ignition-math-in-physics-road-and/diff#chg-gazebo/physics/Population.cc
